Text.val: 29.11.2012 SH SCR17738 Changed char to graphic in DSQL
30.09.2011 GB SCR16685 Changed mask of invoice number (10 -> 20)
02.11.2004 JJ SCR7073 chanfged selection on BPIV, fixed bug displayed text
24.09.2004 JJ SCR7073 dropped selection on BTPC_AMOUNTCURRH <>0
03.05.2004 JJ SCR6123 removed remaining line breaks from DSQL
03.05.2004 JJ SCR6036 cont. modified where clause

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_INVDATE, cast(:5 as decimal(9)), cast(0 as decimal (9)), INVO_SCHT_NO, INVO_LINENO, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE, INVO_TEXT, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AINITIALI, INVO_AINITIALH,cast(0 as decimal (9)), cast(0 as decimal (3)), cast('INVO' as graphic(4)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_INVDATE between ':3' and ':4' and INVO_AINITIALI<>0 union select BTPC_DATCASHREPORT, BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC_LINENO, cast(0 as decimal (9)), cast(BTPC_BTCH_ID as graphic(9)), BTPC_DATCASHREPORT, cast(':6' as graphic(40)), BTCP_CURRENCYPAY, cast(BTPC_AMOUNTCURRPAY * -1 as decimal (13,2)), cast(BTPC_AMOUNTCURRH * -1 as decimal (13,2)), BTPC_JOURNALNO, cast(0 as decimal (3)), cast('BTPC' as char (4)) from :1/BTPC, :1/BTCP where BTPC_BTCH_ID = BTCP_BTCH_ID and BTPC_BTCP_LINENO = BTCP_LINENO and BTPC_DEBC_NO = :2 and BTPC_DATCASHREPORT between ':3' and ':4' union select BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE, BPIV_BTCH_ID, BPIV_BTCP_LINENO, BPIV_BTPC_LINENO, BPIV_LINENO, cast(BPIV_BTCH_ID as graphic(9)), BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE, BPIV_VARIABLETEXT, BPIV_CURRENCY, BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV, BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH,BTPC_JOURNALNO, BPIV_PAYMENTCODE, cast ('BPIV' as graphic(4)) from :1/BPIV, :1/BTPC where BPIV_BTCH_ID = BTPC_BTCH_ID and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = BTPC_BTCP_LINENO and BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = BTPC_LINENO and BPIV_INVOICETYPE = 2 and BTPC_DEBC_NO = :2 and BTPC_DATCASHREPORT between ':3' and ':4' order by 1, 2, 3 ,4, 5 for fetch only

Text.val: For some reason we can't get rid of the default value
Link BTCP for payment level fields
